info.title: Switchfin
info.author: dragonflylee
info.details: Switchfin is third-party PC player for Jellyfin that provides a native user interface to browse and play movies and series.\nSupported media items: movies, series, seasons, episodes\nDirect play and transcoding

changelog:
0.7.1
Add

add suggest/genres tab for collection
Fixed

series/movie view logo layout
refactor media collection view
image load for search sugguest

0.7.0
Add

refactor series view layout
add people view of series/movie

switch: external drive support using libusbhsfs

exception catch under macOS
remote load large file list
use mpv watch-later for remote

- transcode audio codec

Add

- photo viewer support
